content: stitches round 11 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc1 into same stitch sc1 into next 10 stitches *sc2 into next stitch sc10 repeat to the end of the round 72 stitches round 12 bottom ridge remove marker single_crochet into the back of the first stitch replace marker single_crochet into the back of each stitch in this round this will create the bottom ridge sides of basket increasing is finished and the stitch count remains constant at 72 rounds 13-30 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc1 into each stitch to the end of the round 72 stitches continue single_crochet into each stitch for a total of 18 rounds moving the marker at the beginning of each new round note if you do not add handles you will be able to crochet three more rounds to finish slip_stitch into the marked stitch cut a 6 tail and secure weave in tails adding handles round 31 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc11 stitches ch12 skip over 12 stitches sc24 ch12 skip over 12 stitches sc12 round 32 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc11 sc12 into the chain space of the first handle keeping the chain stitches from twisting sc24 sc12 into the chain space of the second handle sc12 round 33 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc1 into each stitch to the end of the round 72 stitches remove marker and slip_stitch into the first stitch of the round to join cut a 6 tail and secure the work weave in ends designed and crocheted by diane l augustin ✧ copyright 2019 all rights reserved dianelaugustin@mac com dianelaugustin@mac com ✧ 651-398-5319 www yarnhappybeadhappy com www ravelry com/designers/diane-l-augustin www yarnhappybeadhappy etsy com
